room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Chicago in Chicago
review: The production level was pretty good and the clues all made perfect sense.

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Chicago in Chicago
review: Had never done on before. Went with Gold Rush. With just the two of us, we managed to beat it without using all the clues and still had 13 minutes left. Now addicted. Cannot recommend enough.

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Chicago in Chicago
review: Did the Gold Rush on Saturday, had a lot of fun. We did the room with 3 strangers and they were fun and smart. Just like us. Hahaha. 6 total and we got out in about 50 minutes. Wasn't too easy and wasn't too hard. Will go back in a few months and try the Heist room. Totally enjoyed this experience.

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Chicago in Chicago
review: I brought my 2 sons (10 and 12) for my youngest’s birthday yesterday and we had a great time! The staff was really welcoming and friendly. We escaped the Gold Rush with about a minute to spare. It was pretty challenging, but the boys loved it. They even gave the birthday boy a t-shirt when we escaped, which he was so thrilled about that he wore it to bed and wore it to school the next day! I will definitely recommend and I’m sure we’ll be back to try another room soon.

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Chicago in Chicago
review: We had the BEST time doing Gold Rush yesterday. We can't wait to go back and try the rest!

room_title: Escape room "Gold Rush" by The Escape Game Chicago in Chicago
review: Awesome games, great location! Highly recommend - I have played Gold Rush, Prison Break, and The Heist and loved them all!
